About the Company: The Ramco Cements Limited (Formerly Madras Cements Ltd) is the flagship company of the Ramco Group, a well-known business group of South India. It is headquartered at Chennai. The main product of the company is Portland cement, manufactured in five state-of-the art production facilities spread over South India, with a current total production capacity of 13.0 MTPA. The company is the fifth largest cement producer in the country. The company also produces Ready Mix Concrete and Dry Mortar products, and operates one of the largest wind farms in the country..The company also engagged in the business of Cement, Windmill Power.
